hero.subtitle1: Say goodbye to complex payment challenges and enter Africa, Asia, and the Maghreb with confidence.
hero.subtitle2: Accept and disburse a wide range of local payment methods and preferred currencies for billions of consumers in emerging markets, with our all-in-one platform.
hero.cta: Contact us and grow your business

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.banner: ADP offers volume discounts if you process more than 500,000 dirhams in sales each month. We also provide discounts to local brands and merchants.
